name: Approach and Landing at Milan Malpensa (FlyBE Embraer E-195)
description:
Onboard FlyBE E195 G-FBEF for an approach, landing and taxi into Milan Malpensa airport (MXP), operating flight BE7354 (Jersey 74WN)  from Manchester (MAN).  Video taken from seat 19A.

FULL TRIP REPORT:  http://aviationphotos.co.uk/index.php/trip-reports/312-road-to-singapore-a380-to-singapore-for-100


We commence our approach from the west, before flying an ILS approach into runway 35R, and taxying in to a remote stand, getting a good view of the traffic on the ground.

Enjoy the flight.

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
